snippet.title: star world?!?!?1?!?11
snippet.description:
Edit: Patreon updates are back, track the progress here: https://www.patreon.com/skelux

Current plan is to cut content back a fair bit so I can just round things off and release the game (although still probably not for a while yet - unlikely this year, at least).

All the levels from the original Star Road are basically done, except for hidden palace. So, I just need to make that level, and also add a handful of missing stars in various levels, fix a bunch of bugs, other smaller stuff.

Most levels do not have the time attack or intro stage fully complete, I can probably reduce the work load here by not remixing all the time attack music.

Hub still needs some work, and have not started on the title screen. 
Probably a bunch of other less noteworthy things I am not thinking of, but anyway, this should fast track things.

The model for course 16 is complete and in the game, but none of the actual level content, so I'll probably just cut it. Even without it, there are several new levels/areas compared to Star Road, in the first arc.

--------------------------------

Funding/Demos: https://www.patreon.com/skelux
Discord: https://skelux.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=18
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BonerLich
Forum: http://skelux.net
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/bonerlich

Supporters are hugely appreciated and a large part of what keeps my projects & channel up and running, as well as viewers who share and follow my posts. Thanks all!
